content: {"Name": "Cohoes Senior Center", "Entity_Id": 352, "Category": "Mobile Food Resources", "Subcategory": "Veggie Mobile\u00ae", "Organization": "Capital Roots", "More_Information": "We recommend calling to verify times and locations\r\nCall or email at least one day ahead to place your order.\r\nEmail: mobilemarket@capitalroots.org", "Counties": ["Albany"], "Location": "", "Address": "10 Cayuga Plaza", "City": "Cohoes", "State": "NY", "Zip": "12047", "Phone": "518-274-8685", "Hours_of_Operation": "Wednesday 2:00pm-3:00pm", "Cost": "", "Accepts": "Cash, EBT/SNAP & FMNP accepted.", "Website": "https://www.capitalroots.org/veggie-mobile/", "Coalition": 0, "CFAN": 0, "Latitude": "42.77712", "Longitude": "-73.701009", "Last_Updated": "06-10-2025", "icon": "marker-795548", "collection_name": "Food Pantries within the Capital District", "collection_category": "Food Pantry"}
